product_name: ExOfficio Persian Fleece Jacket - Women's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: Score style points with the ExOfficio Persian fleece jacket. An asymmetrical zipper, raw seams and plush texture set it apart from the rest of the standard fleece jackets out there. Polyester fleece interior provides soft, breathable warmth; sueded fleece exterior adds contrasting texture. Handwarmer pockets; 1 on-seam zippered security pocket. ExOfficio Persian fleece jacket features a fitted cut; jacket looks like a blazer when worn unzipped. Closeout.
short_description: Score style points with the ExOfficio Persian fleece jacket. An asymmetrical zipper, raw seams and plush texture set it apart from the rest of the standard fleece jackets out there.
